p: Then, blots, blocked with 5% nonfat milk, were incubated with peroxidase-conjugated secondary antibodies (goat anti-mouse or goat anti-rabbit) (1:5000) diluted in 5% skimmed milk for 1 h, and signals were detected by enhanced chemiluminescence reagent (GE Healthcare, Piscataway, NJ, USA). Vehicle was considered as control. The bands obtained were quantitated using NIH imaging software (Available online: https://imagej.nih.gov/ij/download.html).
